text: Good morning sunshine. 2nd day hai aaj, i hope you are good, jada exahust nai horahi ho. Please take care of yourself. Don't forget meri malish karni hai tumhe jab mai wapas aau to. I miss you babu, please be there for me always. I will always love you sone. 🌞 😘

Lunch?. I hope kar leya hoga tumne. aaj kya kya plan hai IE mai. Baatana mujhe pure detail mai. and apna pics lena babu. I want to see you when i switch on my phone. Bahut saare images tumhare. Mere whatsapp wale number pe bejna, not in this. This is just to send you message that i am there for you. Remembering you always 🍱 😘

Good night sona. Kya kar rahi ho. jaldi so jana kal se to or kam hoga na saturday and sunday full day wahi rehena hai na bahut saare kaam bhi karna hai. I really wanted to be there for you in this IE so that i can be close to you. I promise sona that i will be there for you in every situation i dont need any other thing. Just you be there with me will be more than enough for me. Always love me sona
